get.summary: Gets a ledes transformation request history.

parameters.name: InvoiceId
parameters.description: Gets or sets a producer's invoice id.

parameters.name: PayorOrgId
parameters.description: Gets or sets an id of the payor organization.

parameters.name: CallType
parameters.description: Gets or sets the type of the LEDES file.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Gets or sets a start date edge after which the invoice was submitted.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Gets or sets an end date edge before which the invoice was submitted.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Specify certain media types which are acceptable for the response.

parameters.name: ProducerId
parameters.description: The Id of the producer submitting the request.  The ProducerId in the header must match the ProducerId passed in the original request body.

parameters.name: Provider
parameters.description: The access token provided by your service provider.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the user submitting the request.  This value is used for reporting purposes only.  Usernames are defined by the caller.

200.description: The request was successful. See the response body for details.

400.description: The request was incorrectly formatted of missing required headers or parameters.

example.Message: The request was incorrectly formatted of missing required headers or parameters.

401.description: The provider key is not authorized.

example.Message: The provider key is not authorized.

403.description: The requestor is not authorized to view the response.

example.Message: The requestor is not authorized to view the response.

406.description: Provided Accept HTTP Header is not supported.

example.Message: Provided Accept HTTP Header is not supported.
Something went wrong.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Specify certain media types which are acceptable for the response.

parameters.name: Provider

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the user submitting the request.  This value is used for reporting purposes only.  Usernames are defined by the caller.

parameters.name: OutputInvoiceType
parameters.description: Specifies the expected LEDES output type.

parameters.name: CallType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the LEDES file is the final or a preview one.
